title: Phone died 2 months past warranty, local authorized repairer said it was the motherboard
content:
Hello,
So my phone froze then wouldn't restart after I shut it down, as suggest here I went to a local authorized repairer who said they couldn't fix it as it was a motherboard issue.
Is there any help I can get from Google?

Much appreciated,
Starving artist,
Chris!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
